stories.text:
Hi guys, I built a platform that makes it simple for anyone to join a group of anons to buy an NFT. No money deducted till funds are raised. Safe since the underlying is a DAO. So the steps are as follows:

1. Paste an OpenSea/Rarible link of the NFT you are interested in on our website

2. You can see if there are other people who have contributed money to this & how much money they have contributed

3. You can enter the amount you would like to invest (any amount as low as 1 USD). No money deducted at this point

4. Once enough funds have been raised, money will be deducted from your wallet, and you will own part of the NFT. You can see your ownership on a dashboard that will be sent to you by email

Thoughts on this?
stories.title: I built a lightweight group-buy platform for NFTs
Unstuck yourself from the ideas that go nowhere
